findings.title: Avoidance of Unnecessary (Small) Loss During Migration
findings.description: The loss is caused in the `mint()` function of the revised `UniswapV2Pair` contract. In particular, the first-time minting (with `_totalSupply == 0`) will take the `then` branch (line 124) that executes code statements in lines 126-128, followed by `_mint(address(0), MINIMUM_LIQUIDITY)` in line 133.

findings.title: Incompatibility With Deflationary Tokens
findings.description: The MasterChef contract operates as the main entry for interaction with staking users and is incompatible with deflationary tokens.
